services
Class DataCollectionService

java.lang.Object
  services.DataCollectionService

public class DataCollectionService
extends java.lang.Object

This service provides the API for (Data Collection) as described in the MobiSoc paper/documentation. Due to restrictions imposed by KSOAP on the type of dataobects that can be exchanged, for ceratin methods we provide two versions of the API. One that works with KSOAP and the other one works generally. If we do not provide a specific KSOAP version, then the method works with KSOAP as well as in the general case

Author:
Maverick

Constructor Detail

DataCollectionService

public DataCollectionService()
The contructor sets the connection paprameters to connect to the servr for SOAP calls. It also sets the classmap for SOAP based communication.

createAccount

public java.lang.String createAccount(java.lang.String username,
                                      java.lang.String password,
                                      java.lang.String email,
                                      java.lang.String type)
This API is used to create a new user acount

Parameters:
username - User name for the new user
password - Password for the new user
email - Email address for the new user
type - Type for the new user
Returns:
A String describing the results of the insert opeation. Specifically, the username or email may already be there in the database or the password length might not be sufficient.

addSocialContact

public java.lang.Boolean addSocialContact(java.lang.Long uid,
                                          java.lang.Long fid)
This function is used to add a social contact. Note that to insert a mutual social relationship, this funcion should be called twice with the order of user id's reversed. Calling it once will imply that "fid" is a friend of "uid" but not vice a versa

Parameters:
uid - User Id for the main user
fid - User Id for the friend
Returns:
Boolean object representing succes or failure of the operation

requestSocialContact

public java.lang.Boolean requestSocialContact(java.lang.Long requestingUserId,
                                              java.lang.Long requestedUserId,
                                              java.lang.String serviceName)
This function registers an event with the event dispatcher to request a social contact. The request is generated 20 seconds after it is submitted.

Parameters:
reuestingUserId - User Id for the user requesting a social contact
requestedUserId - User Id for the requested social contact
serviceName - Service that will recieve the request
Returns:
Boolean Boolean object reprsenting success or failure of the operation

requestSocialGroupMembership

public java.lang.Boolean requestSocialGroupMembership(java.lang.Long requestingUserId,
                                                      java.lang.Long requestedUserId,
                                                      java.lang.Long groupId,
                                                      java.lang.String serviceName)
This function registers an event with the event dispatcher to request membership to a social group. The request is generated 20 seconds after it is submitted.

Parameters:
reuestingUserId - User Id for the user requesting membership
requestedUserId - User Id for the requested user
groupId - Group Id for the group for which membership is requested
serviceName - Service that will recieve the request
Returns:
Boolean Boolean object reprsenting success or failure of the operation

                                                      java.lang.Long requestedUserId,
                                                      java.lang.Long eventId,
                                                      java.lang.String serviceName)

Parameters:
reuestingUserId - User Id for the user requesting attendance
requestedUserId - User Id for the requested user
eventId - Event Id for the event to which attendance is requested

setPlaceData

public java.lang.Boolean setPlaceData(KVMPlaceData kvmNewPlaceData)
This is KSOAP compatibile wrapper function used to set new place data Note that the location data vector should use KVMCoordinates instead of regular Coordinates class

Parameters:
kvmNewPlaceData - This is the place data inside a KVMPlaceData object.
Returns:
Returns a boolean value indicating success or failure of the insert operation

Parameters:
PlaceData - This is data for the place to be inserted inside a PlaceData object
Returns:
Returns a boolean value indicating success or failure of the insert operation

setUserLocation

public java.lang.Boolean setUserLocation(KVMLocationData locationData)
This method stores a single location data object. Note that this method does not provide a non-KVM interface since the data is coming from mobile phones as KVM objects

Parameters:
locationData - Location information inside a KVMLocationdata object
Returns:
Boolean object representing success or failure of the operation
